mean_cn: n.行为；  v.务必对……进行处理
mean_en: the process of doing something in order to make something happen or to deal with a situation; a thing that somebody does; the way a part of the body moves or functions; the mechanical parts of a piano, gun, clock, etc. or the way the parts move
sentence: It is a polite action to offer your seat to old people.
sentence_trans: 给老人让座是一个有礼貌的行为。
word_etyma: act行动 + ion表行为，情况 → action行为
